entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 01:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2 except near zero inland.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Periods of freezing drizzle inland. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2 except near zero inland. Forecast issued 12:38 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:38 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to snow in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:38 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 12:38 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
